Specifically, who gave Order number one and order number two which disbanded both the Baath Party and the army of Iraq? These orders killed thousands of our troops and hundreds of thousands of Iraqis. Simon Cowell writes I look upon it[ groveling] as a sign of desperation. So many times people come in and they come up with this terrible dialogue about how much they like me or Randy or Paula. It's demeaning, and there's no point to it. We're not looking for a nice person; we're looking for somebody who's confident and assured, but talented above all. Trust me-- most stars aren't nice. 2.
